title: おばけ島へようこそ
description: The Moomin family and friends decide to take a boat trip, though no one can agree on a destination. They discover an island inhabited by mysterious Hattifatteners (ニョロニョロ) who worship a barometer. When Hemulen disturbs their sacred object, he gets chased up a pillar. A storm approaches, and the group must wait it out on the island while learning more about the strange electric creatures.
